appModule.changePw.desc:
Please enter your new password. It must contain:
  • at least 1 upper case letter (A-Z)
  • at least 1 number (0-9)
  • at least 8 characters
appModule.changePw.title: Change Password
appModule.changePwFail.content: Your password change request link has expired. Please submit a password change request again.
appModule.changePwFail.title: Password Change Request
appModule.firstTime.failed.title: Activation Failed
appModule.firstTime.failed.content: This email address activation link is no longer valid.
appModule.firstTime.failed.requestSucces: Please check your email for Activation Link
appModule.emailSentDescription: An email has been sent to you. Please check your email for password reset instructions.
appModule.enterPasswordUnlock: Enter your password to unlock the screen!
appModule.mfa.enter: Enter the code from your authenticator app
appModule.mfa.install:
Please install an authenticator app from App Store or Play Store on your mobile.
(Google Authenticator recommended)
appModule.mfa.scan1: Scan QR code with the authenticator app
appModule.mfa.scan2: If you have problems scanning the QR code, enter the following code into your authenticator app {code}
appModule.mfa.scan3: Enter the 6 digit number verification code from your authentication app
appModule.mfa.title: Multi-Factor Authentication
appModule.name: Name
appModule.requestForm.description: Please fill in and submit the form below. Our Support Team will contact you shortly.
appModule.requestForm.method: What can we help you with?

appModule.requestForm.requestSentDescrip: Our Support will contact you shortly.
appModule.requestForm.title: Request Form
please-enter-a-valid-email-address: Please enter a valid email address.
your-account-has-been-locked--please-sen: Your account has been locked. Please send us a {link} to unlock your account.
sign-in-failed-number: out of 5 attempts failed. If there are 5 sign in failures, the account will be locked.
